title: Bhopal: CBI arrests I-T officer, husband for taking Rs 10 lakh bribe
snippet: Poonam Rai, the Deputy Commissioner of Income Tax, and her husband Ganesh Malviya, a BJP leader, were arrested for accepting a bribe of Rs 10 lakh from a builder. The incident happened at Rai's official residence late on Friday night in Bhopal.

title: BJP leader Ganesh Malviya, I-T officer, others get bail in bribery case
snippet: A local court in Bhopal on Tuesday granted bail to Deputy Commissioner of Income Tax Department Poonam Rai, her husband and BJP leader Ganesh Malviya and two others arrested on Friday by CBI for allegedly accepting a bribe of Rs 10 lakh from a builder.
